assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was performed in line with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki. Approval was granted by the Ethics Review Committee of the University College Hospital, Ibadan (UI/EC/20/0368, 2020), and informed consent was obtained from all participants.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
